mapper.select: select personal_id, personal_name, personal_english, personal_sex, personal_marriage, personal_data, personal_cardtype, personal_card, personal_carddata, personal_nationality, personal_education, personal_issue, personal_answer, personal_addres, personal_addressstatus, personal_maill, personal_familyy, personal_unitname, personal_unitnature, personal_unitphone, personal_industry, personal_unitaddress, personal_unitmail, personal_pursue, personal_duty, personal_income, personal_linkmanname, personal_relation, personal_linkmanphone from js_creditcard.creditcard_personal where personal_id = #{personalId}

select personal_id, personal_name, personal_english, personal_sex, personal_marriage, personal_data, personal_cardtype, personal_card, personal_carddata, personal_nationality, personal_education, personal_issue, personal_answer, personal_addres, personal_addressstatus, personal_maill, personal_familyy, personal_unitname, personal_unitnature, personal_unitphone, personal_industry, personal_unitaddress, personal_unitmail, personal_pursue, personal_duty, personal_income, personal_linkmanname, personal_relation, personal_linkmanphone from js_creditcard.creditcard_personal limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into js_creditcard.creditcard_personal(personal_name, personal_english, personal_sex, personal_marriage, personal_data, personal_cardtype, personal_card, personal_carddata, personal_nationality, personal_education, personal_issue, personal_answer, personal_addres, personal_addressstatus, personal_maill, personal_familyy, personal_unitname, personal_unitnature, personal_unitphone, personal_industry, personal_unitaddress, personal_unitmail, personal_pursue, personal_duty, personal_income, personal_linkmanname, personal_relation, personal_linkmanphone) values (#{personalName}, #{personalEnglish}, #{personalSex}, #{personalMarriage}, #{personalData}, #{personalCardtype}, #{personalCard}, #{personalCarddata}, #{personalNationality}, #{personalEducation}, #{personalIssue}, #{personalAnswer}, #{personalAddres}, #{personalAddressstatus}, #{personalMaill}, #{personalFamilyy}, #{personalUnitname}, #{personalUnitnature}, #{personalUnitphone}, #{personalIndustry}, #{personalUnitaddress}, #{personalUnitmail}, #{personalPursue}, #{personalDuty}, #{personalIncome}, #{personalLinkmanname}, #{personalRelation}, #{personalLinkmanphone})
mapper.update:
update js_creditcard.creditcard_personal
personal_name = #{personalName},
personal_english = #{personalEnglish},
personal_sex = #{personalSex},
personal_marriage = #{personalMarriage},
personal_data = #{personalData},
personal_cardtype = #{personalCardtype},
personal_card = #{personalCard},
personal_carddata = #{personalCarddata},
personal_nationality = #{personalNationality},
personal_education = #{personalEducation},
personal_issue = #{personalIssue},
personal_answer = #{personalAnswer},
personal_addres = #{personalAddres},
personal_addressstatus = #{personalAddressstatus},
personal_maill = #{personalMaill},
personal_familyy = #{personalFamilyy},
personal_unitname = #{personalUnitname},
personal_unitnature = #{personalUnitnature},
personal_unitphone = #{personalUnitphone},
personal_industry = #{personalIndustry},
personal_unitaddress = #{personalUnitaddress},
personal_unitmail = #{personalUnitmail},
personal_pursue = #{personalPursue},
personal_duty = #{personalDuty},
personal_income = #{personalIncome},
personal_linkmanname = #{personalLinkmanname},
personal_relation = #{personalRelation},
personal_linkmanphone = #{personalLinkmanphone},
where personal_id = #{personalId}
